name: rental_ratings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool airdna.
Tool description: API for Short-Term Rental Data Analytics | Vrbo & Airbnb Data | Rentalizer
API description: Fetches rental ratings for a specified location using the AirDNA API.

location.description: The location for which rental ratings are to be fetched.

currency.description: The currency code for the rental ratings. Defaults to None.
